General.Name: Xi'an Sinofuse Electric Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Xi'an Sinofuse Electric Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of circuit protection devices, fuses, and related accessories. Its products have applications in the electric vehicle, communications, rail transit, wind energy, PV, energy storage, power, and other industries. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Xi'an, China.

5.Name: Mr. Junkai  Jia
5.Title: Chairman of the Supervisory Board & Head of Foreign Trade
